CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 19, 1954, pg. 8 reads: "The Courier Home Service Fair at Hunt Armory can be described with one word, "terrific." This panorama of colorful displays, huge crowds, fabulous exhibits and excellent demonstrations is told here in pictures."
TitMainTitle: Woman operating vacuum cleaner with two men observing in Allegheny Kirby Company booth, in Hunt Armory for the 1954 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair, another pose
CatSubject_tab: Trade shows--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Signs--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Hunt Armory (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.
